summary: Iteration 45 - Tino AI Redesign Complete Testing. All features verified: Mouse character default (full body, no circle crop), 3 avatar types (Mouse/Male/Female), Settings panel with character & language options, Meeting Mode continuous listening, Hide Chat toggle, Talk button, Volume toggle, ElevenLabs TTS integration, Avatar animations for all states.
critical_code_review_comments: TinoAvatar component correctly displays full body images (no circle crop) from emergentagent.com
Settings panel properly shows Character options (Mouse, Male, Female) and Language options (Hindi, English)
Meeting Mode activates continuous listening with visual feedback (button changes to Meeting OFF)
Hide Chat toggle works correctly - chat panel hides/shows, avatar takes full width when hidden
Avatar animations defined in index.css: animate-avatar-idle, animate-avatar-listen, animate-avatar-think, animate-avatar-speak
ElevenLabs TTS integration working with 4 voice options (male_hindi, female_hindi, male_english, female_english)
Auto language detection implemented in frontend (detectLanguage function)
